original_text: The multitude of camels shall cover thee, the dromedaries of Midian and Ephah; all they from Sheba shall come: they shall bring gold and incense; and they shall shew forth the praises of the Lord.
korean_text: 허다한 낙타, 미디안과 에바의 어린 낙타가 네 가운데에 가득할 것이며 스바 사람들은 다 금과 유향을 가지고 와서 여호와의 찬송을 전파할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The multitude of camels shall cover thee
the dromedaries of Midian and Ephah
all they from Sheba shall come
sentences.korean_translation: 스바에서 온 모든 자들이 올 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall bring gold and incense
and they shall shew forth the praises of the Lord
